pr_title: Use UTF-8 for conversions between character and binary strings

timeline.message: Don't write binary string literals as character string literals
Always use UTF-8 for conversions between binary and character strings
Override more specific methods instead of convertTo() in Value subclasses
Fix LOB recovery for PageStore engine

timeline.bodyText:
surely the logic here and below should be <= rather than == ?
i.e. if the number of bytes is <= than the destination scalar type, then convert the  bytes by zero extension?
timeline.author: grandinj

replies.bodyText:
I have no idea why H2 allows conversion between numeric and binary string data types, such conversion has a very low meaning. The current implementation here only ensures that conversion from TINYINT to VARBINARY and then back to TINYINT will return the same TINYINT value. Old implementation was insane: some overflows were silently truncated, some were not with a weird exception.
If you need a more advanced logic here, please, describe it in more clear way with all corner cases.
replies.author: katzyn

replies.bodyText:
Then we should rather just remove the conversion logic for VARBINARY->all_integer_types.
I also cannot imagine that this is being used anywhere useful
replies.author: grandinj
